product_name: Victorinox Super Tinker Swiss Army Knife
long_description: A super knife for tinkering about, this pocket knife features large and small blades and a host of other handy tools for any project. Also includes a can opener with small screwdriver, a bottle opener with large screwdriver and wire stripper, scissors, a hook. A reamer with sewing eye, phillips screwdriver, toothpick, tweezers and key ring. Rugged Swiss stainless steel components, sturdy nylon handles and aluminum interior housings ensure this knife will last for years. Crafted by Victorinox of Switzerland.
short_description: A super knife for tinkering about, this pocket knife features large and small blades and a host of other handy tools for any project.
